component.name: importSample
component.doc: Imports data into FMI repository. Following components work from there. importSample_anduril.py runs soft/importSample.pl It looks for seqs.tab file to check whether sample was already imported. If it was, it returns with no error.

input.name: in_file
input.doc: Path to the out_file of transform component.

parameter.name: FMIpath
parameter.doc: Path to the FMI pipeline. This folder contains soft and samples directory.

parameter.name: FMIid
parameter.doc: A folder named FMIid will be created in the FMI repository/samples directory.

parameter.name: perlPATH
parameter.doc: Path to right perl for execution.
